markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Contortionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=1874) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 155 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=45)

**Prerequisites**
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873)

</column>

---

You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the [Quick Squeeze](/Feats.aspx?ID=828) skill feat, and if you're a master in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), you can Squeeze at full Speed. Whenever you successfully [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.
name: Contortionist

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 4" pfs="Standard" > Contortionist Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 155 2.0 Archetype Acrobat Prerequisites Acrobat Dedication --- You can squeeze out of tight situations surprisingly quickly, gaining an advantage against foes that try to pin you down. You gain the Quick Squeeze skill feat, and if you're a master in Acrobatics, you can Squeeze at full Speed. Whenever you successfully Escape using Acrobatics, the creature you Escaped from is flat-footed against the next attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.
